text: Kansas City Bomber is a 1972 American sports drama movie directed by Jerrold Freedman and based on the story by Barry Sandler. It stars Raquel Welch, Kevin McCarthy, Norman Alden, Jodie Foster, Shelly Novack, Helena Kallianiotes, Russ Marin and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jerrold Freedman Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Oregon Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: Kansas City Bomber
